check.name: InvalidJavadocPosition
check.description: Checks that Javadocs are located at the correct position. As specified at Documentation Comment Specification for the Standard Doclet, Javadocs are recognized only when placed immediately before module, package, class, interface, constructor, method, or field declarations. Any other position, like in the body of a method, will be ignored by the javadoc tool and is considered invalid by this check.
